info.description: API documentation for Manabu Japanese Learning Application
info.title: Manabu API - Japanese Learning Application

post.description: Authenticate user with username and password

get.description: Retrieve all categories for a specific JLPT level with pagination
Retrieve a specific category by ID

put.description: Update an existing category by ID (admin only)

delete.description: Delete a category by ID (admin only)

get.description: Retrieve all JLPT levels ordered by level

post.description: Create a new JLPT level (admin only)

get.description: Retrieve a specific JLPT level by ID

put.description: Update an existing JLPT level by ID (admin only)

delete.description: Delete a JLPT level by ID (admin only)

get.description: Retrieve all tags with optional search and pagination

409.description: Tag with this name already exists

get.description: Retrieve a tag by exact name match (case-insensitive)
Retrieve a specific tag by ID

put.description: Update an existing tag by ID (admin only)

409.description: Tag with this name already exists

delete.description: Delete a tag by ID (admin only)

get.description: Retrieve all vocabulary that the authenticated user is learning with pagination and filtering
get.summary: Get all user's vocabulary learning statuses

post.description: Create a new user vocabulary status to start learning a vocabulary word with simple progress tracking

409.description: Vocabulary already being learned by user

422.description: Invalid vocabulary ID or vocabulary not found

get.description: Retrieve all vocabulary that need to be reviewed (based on next_review_date). Note: In simple system, user decides when to review.
Retrieve a specific user vocabulary status by ID including progress tracking data

403.description: Forbidden - status belongs to another user

post.description: Submit review result with simple progress tracking. If correct, increment repetitions (5 correct = completed). If incorrect, reset to 0. User controls when to review.

403.description: Forbidden - status belongs to another user

get.description: Retrieve vocabularies with advanced filtering, search, sorting, and pagination

parameters.description: Search in word, reading, or meaning
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new vocabulary entry (admin only)

409.description: Vocabulary already exists for this JLPT level

422.description: Invalid JLPT level ID or Category ID

get.description: Retrieve a specific vocabulary entry by ID

put.description: Update an existing vocabulary entry by ID (admin only)

409.description: Vocabulary already exists for this JLPT level

422.description: Invalid JLPT level ID or Category ID

delete.description: Delete a vocabulary entry by ID (admin only)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
